description: CMD-OS 0.0.0 is a test release of the first Major release of CMD for OpenStack. In particular, it contains new packages and updates both for Ubuntu Trusty and CentOS7.&nbsp;
releaseNotes: This release contains the following products for CentOS7 and Ubuntu Trusty:&nbsp; <br><br>*** Authentication<br>* keystone-VOMS 9.0.3
installationNotes: All products in CMD-OS 0.0.0 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.
changeLog: This release includes keystone-VOMS, both for Ubuntu and CentOS7.
